    dummyVignette

    reallocationPlot

    reallocationPlot.Rd

    Visualization of predictions from CoDA model

    Usage

    reallocationPlot(
  dc_obj = c(),
  data = c(),
  comps = c(),
  comps_fup = NULL,
  comps.names = c(),
  outcome = c(),
  covs = c(),
  comparisons = c("one-v-one", "prop-realloc")[2],
  increase = c(),
  decrease = c(),
  xlab = c(),
  ylab = c(),
  xlim = c(),
  ylim = c(),
  ReallocationLimits = c(-60, 60),
  xaxis.by = 5,
  ribbon = TRUE,
  font = "Times New Roman",
  main = NULL,
  col = "black",
  alpha = 0.2,
  analysis_type = c("cross-sectional", "longitudinal")[1],
  total = NULL
)

    Arguments

    dc_obj

    Object derived from lm_coda or lm_coda_long

    comps

    String with the name of the composition variables in dataf

    comps_fup

    String with the name of the follow-up composition variables in dataf (optional)

    comps.names

    Names of the composition variables to appear in the plot (it will use comps if not provided)

    outcome

    String with the name of the outcome in dataf

    covs

    String with the name of the covariates

    comparisons

    Two choices ("one-v-one" or "prop-realloc")

    increase

    What variable in the composition should increase in the visualization (replacement)

    decrease

    What variable/s in the composition should decrease in the visualization (replaced)

    xlab

    X axis label

    ylab

    Y axis label

    xlim

    Limits of the X axis (time reallocation limits)

    ylim

    Limits for the Y axis (autogenerated if not provided)

    ReallocationLimits

    limits for the reallocation time in minutes (vector of 2 numbers)

    xaxis.by

    X axis ticks at every xaxis.by minutes

    ribbon

    Logical. Whether to plot confidence intervals of the predictions

    font

    Font to use (default = "Times New Roman")

    main

    Title of the plot

    col

    Color for lines and confidence intervals

    alpha

    Alpha for transparency in confidence intervals

    analysis_type

    One of "cross-sectiona", "longitudinal", "change".

    total

    Total time to constrain the composition to.

    Value

    reallocation plot with predictions

    Details

    If follow-up composition is provided, it will run prospective and change models/visualizations

    On this page
